verses.text: \w When|strong="H3588"\w* \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w* \w was|strong="H3478"\w* \w young|strong="H5288"\w*, \w then|strong="H3588"\w* \w I|strong="H3588"\w* \w began|strong="H3478"\w* \w to|strong="H3478"\w* love \w him|strong="H7121"\w*, \w and|strong="H1121"\w* out \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w Egypt|strong="H4714"\w* \w I|strong="H3588"\w* \w called|strong="H7121"\w* \w my|strong="H3588"\w* \w son|strong="H1121"\w*.

\w No|strong="H3808"\w*! \w They|strong="H3588"\w* \w return|strong="H7725"\w* \w to|strong="H7725"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* land \w of|strong="H4428"\w* \w Egypt|strong="H4714"\w*, Assyria \w will|strong="H4428"\w* \w be|strong="H3808"\w* \w their|strong="H7725"\w* \w king|strong="H4428"\w*, \w for|strong="H3588"\w* \w they|strong="H3588"\w* \w have|strong="H4714"\w* \w refused|strong="H3985"\w* \w to|strong="H7725"\w* \w return|strong="H7725"\w* \w to|strong="H7725"\w* \w me|strong="H7725"\w*.

\w For|strong="H7121"\w* \w my|strong="H7311"\w* \w people|strong="H5971"\w* \w are|strong="H5971"\w* \w bent|strong="H8511"\w* \w in|strong="H7121"\w* rebellion against \w me|strong="H7121"\w*, \w even|strong="H3808"\w* if \w they|strong="H3808"\w* \w call|strong="H7121"\w* \w on|strong="H7121"\w* \w the|strong="H7121"\w* Most \w High|strong="H7311"\w* \w he|strong="H3808"\w* \w will|strong="H5971"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w raise|strong="H7311"\w* \w them|strong="H7121"\w*\f + \fr 11.7 \ft Heb. uncertain.\f*.

How can \w I|strong="H5414"\w* \w give|strong="H5414"\w* \w you|strong="H5414"\w* \w up|strong="H5414"\w*, Ephraim! \w Give|strong="H5414"\w* \w you|strong="H5414"\w* \w over|strong="H5921"\w*, \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*! How am \w I|strong="H5414"\w* \w to|strong="H3478"\w* \w give|strong="H5414"\w* \w you|strong="H5414"\w* \w up|strong="H5414"\w* \w as|strong="H5414"\w* Admah! \w Make|strong="H7760"\w* \w you|strong="H5414"\w* \w like|strong="H3478"\w* \w Zeboim|strong="H6636"\w*! \w My|strong="H5414"\w* \w heart|strong="H3820"\w* asserts itself, \w my|strong="H5414"\w* sympathies \w are|strong="H3478"\w* \w all|strong="H3162"\w* aglow.

\w I|strong="H3588"\w* \w will|strong="H5892"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w carry|strong="H6213"\w* \w into|strong="H7725"\w* \w effect|strong="H6213"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w fierceness|strong="H2740"\w* \w of|strong="H5892"\w* \w my|strong="H7725"\w* \w anger|strong="H2740"\w*, \w I|strong="H3588"\w* \w will|strong="H5892"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w turn|strong="H7725"\w* \w to|strong="H7725"\w* \w destroy|strong="H7843"\w* Ephraim, \w for|strong="H3588"\w* \w God|strong="H3808"\w* am \w I|strong="H3588"\w*, \w and|strong="H7725"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* man, \w holy|strong="H6918"\w* \w in|strong="H6213"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w midst|strong="H7130"\w* \w of|strong="H5892"\w* \w you|strong="H3588"\w*, \w therefore|strong="H3588"\w* \w I|strong="H3588"\w* \w will|strong="H5892"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* consume.

\w They|strong="H3588"\w* \w will|strong="H3068"\w* \w follow|strong="H3212"\w* \w after|strong="H3588"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \nd \+w Lord|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*. \w Like|strong="H1121"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* lion \w he|strong="H1931"\w* \w will|strong="H3068"\w* \w roar|strong="H7580"\w*, \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w when|strong="H3588"\w* \w he|strong="H1931"\w* \w roars|strong="H7580"\w* \w his|strong="H3068"\w* \w children|strong="H1121"\w* \w will|strong="H3068"\w* \w come|strong="H3212"\w* \w trembling|strong="H2729"\w* \w from|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w west|strong="H3220"\w*.

\w They|strong="H3068"\w* \w will|strong="H3068"\w* \w come|strong="H2729"\w* \w trembling|strong="H2729"\w* \w like|strong="H1004"\w* \w the|strong="H5002"\w* \w birds|strong="H6833"\w* \w from|strong="H5921"\w* \w Egypt|strong="H4714"\w*, \w like|strong="H1004"\w* \w doves|strong="H3123"\w* \w from|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H5002"\w* land \w of|strong="H1004"\w* Assyria. \w And|strong="H3068"\w* \w I|strong="H5921"\w* \w will|strong="H3068"\w* bring \w them|strong="H5921"\w* \w back|strong="H1004"\w* \w to|strong="H3068"\w* \w their|strong="H3068"\w* \w houses|strong="H1004"\w*, – \w declares|strong="H5002"\w* \w the|strong="H5002"\w* \nd \+w Lord|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*. Israel’s faithlessness from the first

Ephraim has encompassed me with falsehood, and the house of Israel with deceit. But Judah still wanders with God faithful to the Holy One\f + \fr 11.12 \ft Heb. uncertain. Or “Judah is still restless against God”\f*.
